roleset.name: enclose twice
roleset.note: DOUBLEWRAP-V NOTES: frame by Perryn (from doublewrap.01-v)

example.name: careful packing
example.text: It was a big=big cardboard box wrapped *-1 in parcel tape, inside, which *T*-1 was double-wrapped *-1.
example.arg: which-1 -- a big-big cardboard box wrapped in parcel tape, inside
